name: Ahedo
overview: Ahedo is a hidden sandstone gem for rock climbing enthusiasts located in the region of Cantabria, Spain. It offers a wide range of routes and boulder problems with crisp holds and an optimal climbing season in spring and autumn. With its beautiful natural surroundings, Ahedo is a popular destination for climbers from around the world.

Ahedo es un pequeño paraíso para los amantes de la escalada en roca arenisca, situado en la región de Cantabria, España. Ofrece una gran variedad de rutas y problemas boulder con agarres nítidos y una temporada óptima en primavera y otoño. Con su hermoso entorno natural, Ahedo es un lugar popular para escaladores de todo el mundo.
